alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 14 at 11:00AM EDT until March 15 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Edwardsport. White River at Hazleton. White River at Petersburg. .Ongoing flooding will continue along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers due to rainfall last weekend. Minor flooding is occurring, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. The East Fork White River has crested. The crest of the White River is near Petersburg. The crest of the Wabash River is approaching Mount Carmel. Flooding will gradually end this week, with the last of the flooding forecast to end Saturday. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Edwardsport. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.6 feet, INDOT may close SR 358 between SR 67 at Edwardsport to SR 57 at Plainville due to flooding. SR 358 floods on the east side of the river between the levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EDT Monday /6:00 AM CDT Monday/ the stage was 18.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 AM EDT Monday /6:00 AM CDT Monday/ was 20.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 8.5 feet Thursday, March 24. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Even 6 inches of fast-moving flood water can knock you off your feet and a depth of 2 feet will float your car. Never try to walk, swim, or drive through such swift water. If you come upon flood waters, stop, turn around and go another way. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
